name: Takeover fails with invalid OTP
fullName: A Debtor Service Provider performs takeover of an existing activation: Takeover fails with invalid OTP

steps.name: Given the debtor Service Provider is authenticated
And the debtor Service Provider B is authenticated
And the debtor A has fiscal code random
And the debtor Service Provider activated the debtor A
When the debtor Service Provider B tries takeover with invalid OTP for debtor A
Then the takeover fails because of invalid OTP

labels.name: feature
labels.value: A Debtor Service Provider performs takeover of an existing activation

items.statusDetails: requests.exceptions.HTTPError: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: https://api-mcshared.uat.cstar.pagopa.it/auth/token
